summary: Logs detailed information (e.g. Actor Values, Active Magic Effects, possibly corrupt Actor Values) on actors and gives the player an opportunity to fix possibly corrupt Actor Values.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=7][color=#ff9900]Actor Details[/color][/size][/center]
[b]Version:[/b] 0.5
[b]Date:[/b] 6 Nov 2012
[b]Category:[/b] Utilities
[b]Author:[/b] kuertee
[b]Source:[/b] [url=
    \"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26538/]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26538/[/url]
[b]Requirements:[/b]
    [list]
      [*]Skyrim 1.8
      [*]Skyrim Script Extender [url=
      \"http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]
    [/list]
[center][size=7][color=#ff9900]Short description[/color][/size][/center]
Logs detailed information (e.g. Actor Values, Active Magic Effects, possibly corrupt Actor Values) on actors and gives the player an opportunity to fix possibly corrupt Actor Values.

[center][size=7][color=#ff9900]Description[/color][/size][/center]
When the Actor Details spells are cast the mod:
  [list=1]
    [*]Queries and logs all of the Actor\'s Actor Values.
    [*]Queries and logs all of the Actor\'s Active Magic Effects.
    [*]Queries and logs all of the Actor\'s equipped Inventory that affects any of the Actor\'s Actor Values.
    [*]Creates a temporary doppleganger of the Actor for use as a base Actor to find corrupt Actor Values. Ignore this doppleganger\'s Argonian Face or disembodied head. They have no bearing in finding corrupt Actor Values.
    [*]Applies on the doppleganger all of the Actor\'s Active Magic Effects and adds and equips all of the Actor\'s equipped Inventory.
    [*]Queries the dopplegangers Actor Values and compares them with the Actor\'s to find possibly corrupt Actor Values.
    [*]Presents to the player any possibly corrupt Actor Values and gives them the opportunity to fix them with ModAV - the only method available to us for such a function.

[b]Note:[/b] If you are unsure of the fix, do not fix it. Actor Values that are not safe for fixing are noted. However, this doesn\'t mean that Actor Values that are safe for fixing should be blindly fixed.

It is best to Alt-Tab out to the folder and examine the logs in C:\\Users\\{user name}\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Logs\\Script\\User\\kuerteeActorDetails.0.log to manually determine which Actor Values are actually corrupt. Only fix Actor Values that you know for sure are corrupt.
  [/list]
[center][size=7][color=#ff9900]Sample log[/color][/size][/center]

[center][size=7][color=#ff9900]Install[/color][/size]
  [list]
    [*]Use Wrye Bash (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1840) to install
    this mod. Just drag the package (which is a normal ZIP file) into Wrye Bash\'s
    Installers tab. However, the package is only a normal ZIP file, so if you know the
    game\'s mod file structure, install it manually.

    [*]Activate the mod.
  [/list]
[size=7][color=#ff9900]Uninstall[/color][/size]
  [list]
    [*]Deactivate the mod with Wrye Bash. If you installed this manually, simply delete
    all the files you installed. (Wrye Bash keeps track of files used, so
    installing/uninstalling the mod with it is 100% simpler.)
  [/list][/center]
[center][size=7][color=#ff9900]History[/color][/size][/center]
  [list]
    [b]0.5, 6 Nov 2012:[/b]
    [*]Initial release.
  [/list]
[center][size=7][color=#ff9900]Credits[/color][/size]

You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that you give
  me credit. I would also like to be contacted when you include this mod in part or in
  full in a public release.[/center]
author: kuertee
